alert.note: Alert for Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 10:43PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Val Verde County through 1130 PM CDT... At 1043 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Long Point, or 13 miles north of Del Rio, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Long Point, Devils Shores, San Pedro Canyon, 277 North Campground, Rough Canyon Recreation Area, Spur 406 Campground, Devils River State Nat Area Big Satan and 277 South Boat Ramp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
